verses.text: Now the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.\f + \fr 31.1 \ft slain: or, wounded\f*

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* followed \w hard|strong="H1692"\w* upon \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and upon his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, and \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and \w Malchi-shua|strong="H4444"\w*, \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* went \w sore|strong="H3513"\w* against \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and the \w archers|strong="H3384"\w* \w hit|strong="H4672"\w* him; and he was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2342"\w* of the \w archers|strong="H3384"\w*.\f + \fr 31.3 \ft and the archers: Heb. and the shooters, men with bows\f*\f + \fr 31.3 \ft hit…: Heb. found him\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* unto his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, \w Draw|strong="H8025"\w* thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and thrust me \w through|strong="H1856"\w* therewith; lest these \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and thrust me \w through|strong="H1856"\w*, and \w abuse|strong="H5953"\w* me. But his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not; for he was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. Therefore \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon it.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft abuse…: or, mock me\f*

And when his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* likewise upon his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* with him.

So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and his \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, and all his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

¶ And when the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, and \add they\add* that \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* were \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*; and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in them.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, that they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.

And they cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and stripped \w off|strong="H6584"\w* his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, to \w publish|strong="H1319"\w* \add it in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*, and among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And they \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*: and they \w fastened|strong="H8628"\w* his \w body|strong="H1472"\w* to the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Beth-shan|strong="H1052"\w*.

¶ And when the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of that which the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*;\f + \fr 31.11 \ft of that: or, concerning him that\f*

All the \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w body|strong="H1472"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* from the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Beth-shan|strong="H1052"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* them there.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \add them\add* under a \w tree|strong="H0815"\w* at \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
